bio:
Web designers | SEO Experts | Mobile Apps -
We are web developers and SEO experts from India, with over 12 years of experience. In our team we have hands on XHTML and CSS coders, Php MySQL , AJAX programmers, Android developers and expert SEO professionals. With over almost 300 websites and various graphic works , database driven websites such as Job Sites, Dating websites, Video sharing and Upload , Content Management Systems, Forums, Blog templates and Mobile applications - we can easily say that we know what you mean and require.
We are available almost round the clock online. During conversations, all of us can speak fluent English and can understand European and American accents pretty easily too . If you believe a project can be best communicated over Phone , it is perfectly OK.

We believe that this is a professional market place and hence strict professional rules apply.  We provide very good communication and deliver exactly what is quoted for and , often more. 
Hence, we like to work with Escrow Payments , totally through the Guru.com website. 
We don't provide any samples or mockups before you award the project to us. We will gladly do revisions on a awarded project , as discussed. 
After we are awarded a project, we create a Project Agreement which is sent for your review and acceptance. If we agree on this , any additional changes required beyond this agreement will have to be sent using Change of Order option in Guru.com. 
We have our own testing server - where we can provide / upload all work for you to view as we progress . We take final payment only AFTER i deliver the final work files / install on your server.
Please view our Reviews and Feedbacks on Guru.com, which will show how much dedicatedly we work on a

abstrac: What do you need done? Looking for custom built applications with knowledgeable training and support? Need purpose built hardware or platform integration, let us help
bio:
When I am not writing code I am hitting the trails on my mountain bike.

I am doing prototyping work with ARM Processing to provide a platform for sustainable computing, to help reduce the energy burden of mundane daily pc workstation use.  Thin Client and Web technologies are being used in our eventual product to enable better use of embedded computing platforms.
Open Source Technologies are calling me to release a framework, I just need to condense some vagueness into status:200 content.  I am a software developer focusing on web technologies & open source development.  I am most skilled in the Microsoft stack but I have exploitable talents in many other areas.

I am trying to offer Telecom & Energy services as well as sustainable computing to the community as well to provide a personal vendor your IT related issues & needs.  How can I help you?  Luke.jcsc@live.com   lets get on Skype and discuss your project.

I require part if not all the payment upfront to allow me to allocate time for your project.   This allows me to know you are serious and allows me to cover hosting or other costs that need to be in cured as a result of your project.

Simple requests have a 72 hour SLA, larger projects may require addition time to work out bugs/glitches.  

I can be on-site at your request & expense.

Will provide discounts for long term contracts & multi-project requests

I am looking to be an open source advocate for the community, if you require help, let me know cost does not have to be a barrier.

Gratuities in BitCoin would gladly be accepted if our services meet or exceed your demand.  We are looking to grow in staff to provide more & better quality services  to the community, and we could use your help getting there by letting us build your next software/hardware project.

abstrac: Telemarketing , Back Office Support, Data Entry, Customer Service
bio:
Theseus Global Solutions is rapidly developing into a sought-after outsource contact service provider in the Philippines serving local and foreign clients. Our objective is to provide our clients with the most wide-ranging and reliable bespoke service presently accessible in the contact center industry.

Established in 2007, Phildata Business Solutions merged with Double Tap Executives to form THESEUS GLOBAL SOLUTIONS. We have inbound, outbound and back-office support capabilities, and we maximize our efforts to service each client as if they are our only client. We supply solutions to generate, make possible, and enrich profitable business for our clients and their customers. 

We consider our experience, integrity, and being result-oriented as core competencies in creating and delivering value to our clients.

We make the most of the latest in call center technology and deploy highly skilled personnel consistent with the globally accepted standards. Our team is comprehensively traine
Hours of operation is 24 hrs. / 6 days a week, payment terms is weekly (per hour), our communication is English.
